highlightsText: 325+ channels to stream with the SXM App
Ad-free music for every genre & decade plus artist-created channels
Original talk, podcasts, exclusive comedy & news from every angle
Play-by-play of select major sports, NASCARÂ®, plus the biggest names in sports talk
SiriusXM video library of in-studio shows & performances
offerDescription.footer: No car required to listen to your favorites in all your favorite places—on your phone, at home, and online. View Channel Lineup

offerInfos.offerDetails: OFFER DETAILS: Your selected subscription package will begin immediately upon completion of your order (if on trial your selected package will begin at the end of your trial period) and service will automatically renew thereafter and you will be charged according to your chosen payment method at the then-current rates of your selected package (current rates shown above). Fees and taxes apply. A credit card is required. See our Customer Agreement for complete terms and how to cancel, which includes calling us at 1-866-635-2349. All fees, content and features are subject to change. Channel lineup varies by package.
